text: I will be giving a talk at the AGU Fall Meeting 2023 on Monday, December 11 at 5:21-5:30pm PST
I passed my preliminary oral exam and have been admitted to candidacy!
I passed my preliminary written exam!
My deep learning-based research on smallholder field delineation was featured in an NC State University News article
I won the Gladys West Award at the Center for Geospatial Analytics' fourth annual CGA Awards
I gave an oral presentation at AGU '22, entitled, 'Monitoring Smallholder Agriculture at Scale with Convolutional Networks and Data Augmentation'
I co-organized GIS Week at NC State with fellow students, Caitlin Haedrich and Andrew Shannon, and taught a workshop on open-source geospatial science software
Dr. Josh Gray presented a poster about our computationally-intensive smallholder agriculture research at the '21-'22 NASA LCLUC Science Team Meeting and Silver Jubilee Celebration
I began giving guest lectures about computer science, remote sensing, agriculture, and climate change for Skype a Scientist
I became the Co-President of the Geospatial Graduate Student Organization at NC State University
I became a member of the Center for Geospatial Analytics' Development Committee
I became a member of the College of Natural Resources' Graduate Student DEI Coalition
I mentored female and non-binary students through their programming projects at Pearl Hacks '22
I wrote a guest post about efficiently monitoring small farms from space for the Center for Geospatial Analytics
I gave an oral presentation at AGU '21, entitled, 'Monitoring Crop Development in Smallholder Farms Using Remotely Sensed Time Series Data Augmentation'
I guest lectured for Dr. Josh Gray's Earth from Space (ES 113) and Geospatial Data Mining (GIS 713) courses
I became a Graduate Career Mentor for NC State University's College of Natural Resources
I won a the Center for Geospatial Analytics' Travel Award to partially fund my expenses to present at AGU '21
I taught the Google Earth Engine portion of a workshop on remote sensing for the CATALYST program for disabled high schoolers
I mentored female and non-binary students through their programming projects at Pearl Hacks '21
I taught a workshop for the NC Math and Science Education Network's STEM Day for K-12 students
I became a Mentor for Rewriting the Code
I served as a Learning Assistant and helped Dr. Brian White pilot his course, Data Science for Earth (COMP 590), at UNC Chapel Hill
I became a Head Undergraduate Teaching Assistant for COMP 110 at UNC Chapel Hill
I was accepted into the Ph.D. in Geospatial Analytics program at NC State University
A tech startup I co-founded, Acta Solutions (formerly demos), was awarded the Robert E. Bryan Fellowship
I co-wrote a piece about the importance of outreach to boost diversity in computer science for Rewriting the Code
I became a Teaching Assistant for Girls Who Code at UNC Chapel Hill
I became an Undergraduate Teaching Assistant for Kris Jordan's Intro to Programming (COMP 110) courses at UNC Chapel Hill
I was awarded the Carolina Scholarship, a merit-based scholarship at UNC Chapel Hill
